rows.label: qev093206_MSG0010
rows.name: Wha—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0020
rows.name: What in the heck is all this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0030
rows.name:
Ohoho! It pizza paradise!
Can Tatsu really dig in?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0040
rows.name:
Yeah, my treat.
Eat as much as you like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_JNK0050
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev093206_SEL0060
rows.name:
Note that Project Pizza-Pie
was a team effort.

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0070
rows.name:
Ohh, yeah, my bad.
This one's OUR treat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0080
rows.name: What did you do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0090
rows.name: Ah, nothing much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0100
rows.name:
The two of us just got a little BLADE 
business outta the way, is all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0110
rows.name: Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0120
rows.name:
You two... I don't know what you've been up to,
but you really seem to be getting along.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0130
rows.name: Sorry. Didn't mean to steal away your champ.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0140
rows.name: It's okay. Actually, I'm kind of glad that you did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0150
rows.name:
We both know people find you a bit tricky sometimes.
I'm happy you made a friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0160
rows.name: Huh? Mister Al not have friends?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0170
rows.name: Tatsu—you can't say that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0180
rows.name: Holy moly, are you guys a handful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0190
rows.name:
I didn't step into the role of "lone wolf hero"
because it sounded like fun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0200
rows.name:
I mean, look at what I'm sharin' here—
if that ain't love, I don't know what is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0210
rows.name: Ha ha! Yes, that's true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0215
rows.name: That's just the kind of person you are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0220
rows.name: I-I'm sorry—"love"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0230
rows.name: That's right, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0240
rows.name:
Since our escape from Earth,
it's been one thing after another.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0250
rows.name: But right here and now, this is my home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0260
rows.name:
And a home, is where you've
got family to come back to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0265
rows.name: Get it? That makes all you guys my family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0270
rows.name:
It's only natural to love your family.
Anyone would.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0275
rows.name: Am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0280
rows.name: D'aww...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0290
rows.name: ...Oh? Someone's having fun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0300
rows.name: Hi there, Colonel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0310
rows.name: Huh. We've got more company.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0320
rows.name:
Yep. A personal invitation from the hero himself?
Like I was gonna pass that up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0330
rows.name:
Word only just reached us, though.
It was so sudden, I literally gasped![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0340
rows.name: This guy's always keepin' us on our toes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0345
rows.name: Eh...beats being bored out of our Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0350
rows.name: So sweet of you to say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0360
rows.name: Ahh, we know what this is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0365
rows.name: Cats and wolves make strange bedfellows indeed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0370
rows.name:
We are soldiers. We fight.
Soon, the battlefield will beckon us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0380
rows.name: But here, right now...it's family pizza time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093206_MSG0385
rows.name: Let's enjoy it.[ST:wait ]
